meanings.definition: A person, typically a young boy, who delivers newspapers.
meanings.sent1: The paperboys ride their bicycles to deliver newspapers every morning.
meanings.sent2: I used to be a paperboy when I was younger, delivering newspapers in my neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The paperboys accidentally delivered newspapers to the wrong houses, causing confusion.
meanings.sent4: The paperboys were like diligent messengers, ensuring everyone received their daily news.
meanings.sent5: The image of the paperboys on their bikes is a nostalgic memory for many people.
